rationale: Multiple external links use insecure HTTP protocol instead of HTTPS, which can trigger browser security warnings and appears unprofessional to tech-savvy recruiters
problemSolved: Lines 576-597 contain multiple http:// links: uprm.edu, linkedin.com/in/abediaz (2x), instagram.com/abe238, twitter.com/abe238 (2x), amazon.com/disasterrelief, contrastshowers.com. These trigger mixed content warnings and are less secure.
